app.name: YAPE 4 U
app.long_description:
YAPE 4 U
Port of yapesdl by calmopyrin
You'll get best results with a USB keyboard and reading all the keyboard shortcuts in the Readme on GitHub. Some functionality, such as the debug monitor, not available on Wii U yet. Wii U version supports the gamepad, MINUS button to open/close the settings menu.
